title: Partnerships
text:
In addition to our strong team, we are proud to have the support from some key partners.

The Association of Public and Land-grant Universities <https://www.aplu.org/> (APLU) is a research, policy, and advocacy organizationdedicated to strengthening and advancing the work of public universities. It is North America's oldest higher education association with member institutions in all 50 U.S. states, the District of Columbia, four U.S. territories, as well as Canada, and Mexico. 

The Kentucky Community and Technical College System (KCTCS) <https://kctcs.edu/> is one of the first systems in the country to provide students with access to advanced Curricular Analytics tools.
